file.name: bets.api-mock.yaml
file.content:
apiVersion: apirator.io/v1alpha1
kind: APIMock
metadata:
  name: bets
spec:
  service:
    port: 7000
    type: NodePort
  ingress:
    hostname: apimock.svc.cluster.local
    path: /api/players
  definition: |
    openapi: 3.0.0
    servers:
      - description: APIMock Server
        url: >-
          https://apimock.svc.cluster.local
    info:
      title: Bets - Players API
      x-apirator-mock-path: /api/players
      description: These APIs is part of bets solution. This APIs is responsible to players management.
      version: 0.0.1
      contact:
        email: tiago@apirator.com
      license:
        name: Apache 2.0
        url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
    tags:
      - name: players
        description: Players management APIs
    paths:
      '/api/players/{player-id}':
        get:
          operationId: get-players-by-id
          summary: Get Player Details
          tags:
            - players
          parameters:
            - name: player-id
              in: path
              description: Player ID
              required: true
              schema:
                type: string
          responses:
            '200':
              description: 200 response
              content:
                application/json:
                  examples:
                    joe:
                      value:
                        name: Joe Doe
                        email: joe@doe.com
            '404':
              description: 404 response
              content:
                application/json:
                  examples:
                    error:
                      value:
                        code: 404
                        message: not found
